Japanese:
//Text $1A74A0
#WRITE(ptr,$189DD8)
雪の山林にある小屋。[LINE]
弓の名手アルバ・トーンが隠棲している。[END]
English:
//Text $1A74A0
#WRITE(ptr,$189DD8)
A hut in a snowy mountain forest.[LINE]
Home to master archer [Alba] Torn.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7410
#WRITE(ptr,$189E10)
ファンダリアの北部にある国境の街。[LINE]
ジェノスを境に南がファンダリア、[LINE]
北がセインガルドの領土に分かれている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7410
#WRITE(ptr,$189E10)
A border town in the northern part of[LINE]
Phandaria. Phandaria owns the south[LINE]
and Seinegald owns the north.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7390
#WRITE(ptr,$189E48)
ファンダリアの首都。[LINE]
整備された町並みに降り積もる雪が[LINE]
人々の喧騒を吸収してくれる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7390
#WRITE(ptr,$189E48)
The capital of Phandaria.[LINE]
The snow on the streets absorbs [LINE]
the hustle and bustle of the city.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7328
#WRITE(ptr,$189E80)
セインガルドの首都。[LINE]
整備された城下町は、人々で賑わっている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7328
#WRITE(ptr,$189E80)
Capital of Seinegald.[LINE]
This well-developed town is filled[LINE]
with people.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A72C0
#WRITE(ptr,$189EB8)
セインガルドの東部にある街。[LINE]
郊外の街らしく、ゆっくりとした時間が[LINE]
流れている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A72C0
#WRITE(ptr,$189EB8)
A city in the eastern part of[LINE]
Seinegald. Like other suburban[LINE]
towns, time passes slowly.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7240
#WRITE(ptr,$189EF0)
セインガルドの北東海域の島に造られた[LINE]
オベロン社の工場。[LINE]
現在は閉鎖されている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7240
#WRITE(ptr,$189EF0)
An Oberon factory built on an island[LINE]
in the northeastern waters of[LINE]
Seinegald. It's currently closed.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A71E0
#WRITE(ptr,$189F28)
フィッツガルドの北部にある村。[LINE]
ほとんどの村民が農業と牧畜を営んでいる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A71E0
#WRITE(ptr,$189F28)
A village in the northern region of[LINE]
Fitzgald. Most of the villagers engage[LINE]
in agriculture or cattle farming.[END]

//Text $1A7188
#WRITE(ptr,$189F60)
An archaeological site located in[LINE]
the northern inner bay of Fitzgald.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7100
#WRITE(ptr,$189F98)
カルバレイスの南部にある港町。[LINE]
厳しい環境のカルバレイスにとって[LINE]
他国の物資が補給できる港は、まさに生命線。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7100
#WRITE(ptr,$189F98)
A port town in the southern region of Calvalese.[LINE]
Supplies from other countries flow through here,[LINE]
making it a lifeline against the harsh environment.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7088
#WRITE(ptr,$189FD0)
カルバレイスの首都。[LINE]
店舗の軒先には、夜になると色とりどりの[LINE]
ネオンサインが輝く。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7088
#WRITE(ptr,$189FD0)
Capital of Calvalese.[LINE]
The store roofs are covered with colorful[LINE]
neon lights that glow at night.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7000
#WRITE(ptr,$18A008)
カルバレイスの西部にある街。[LINE]
堆積した大昔の産業廃棄物の山を再利用して[LINE]
生活する人々が住んでいる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7000
#WRITE(ptr,$18A008)
A city in the western region of Calvalese.[LINE]
The people there live by reusing piles of[LINE]
industrial waste from long ago.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6F90
#WRITE(ptr,$18A040)
かつて勇名を馳せた船。[LINE]
現在は海中深くに沈み、[LINE]
その存在を知る者はいない。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6F90
#WRITE(ptr,$18A040)
A ship once known for its heroics.[LINE]
It is now submerged deep in the sea,[LINE]
and no one knows of its existence.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6F28
#WRITE(ptr,$18A078)
セインガルドの西部にある村。[LINE]
質素な村には不釣合いな大きな屋敷がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6F28
#WRITE(ptr,$18A078)
A village in the western region of[LINE]
Seinegald. It has a mansion that is[LINE]
out of place for the humble village.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18A0B0)
セインガルドの北部にある村。[LINE]
ストレイライズ神殿への巡礼者が立ち寄る[LINE]
憩いの村。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6EC0
#WRITE(ptr,$18A0B0)
A village in the northern region of[LINE]
Seinegald. Pilgrims of Straylize Temple[LINE]
stop by to rest and relax.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6E38
#WRITE(ptr,$18A0E8)
森の奥に整然とたたずむ神殿。[LINE]
神殿としてだけでなく、研究施設としての[LINE]
役割も担っている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6E38
#WRITE(ptr,$18A0E8)
A temple that stands neatly in the[LINE]
depths of the forest. It also operates[LINE]
as a research facility.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6DB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A120)
ファンダリアの南部にある街。[LINE]
２年前に王家の軍が派遣されて街は戦場と[LINE]
化したが、現在は復興を遂げている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6DB8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A120)
A city in the southern region of Phandaria.[LINE]
Two years ago, the city was a battlefield,[LINE]
but it is now recovering.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6D38
#WRITE(ptr,$18A158)
ファンダリアの東部にある港町。[LINE]
温泉があるため、他国からも湯治目的の[LINE]
観光客が訪れる。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6D38
#WRITE(ptr,$18A158)
A port town in the eastern region of Phandaria.[LINE]
Because of its hot springs, tourists come here[LINE]
for hot spring therapy.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6CE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A190)
アクアヴェイルの北部にある[LINE]
シデン家が治める領内の街。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6CE8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A190)
A city in the northern region of Aquaveil.[LINE]
Its territory is ruled by the Shiden family.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6C98
#WRITE(ptr,$18A1C8)
アクアヴェイルの南部にある[LINE]
トウケイ家が治める領内の街。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6C98
#WRITE(ptr,$18A1C8)
A city in the southern region of Aquaveil.[LINE]
Its territory is ruled by the Terrazi family.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6C48
#WRITE(ptr,$18A200)
アクアヴェイルの西部にある[LINE]
モリュウ家が治める領内の街。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6C48
#WRITE(ptr,$18A200)
A city in the western region of Aquaveil.[LINE]
Its territory is ruled by the Moreau family.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6BD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18A238)
フィッツガルドの南部にある新興の街。[LINE]
闘技場では日夜激闘が繰り広げられている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6BD0
#WRITE(ptr,$18A238)
A developing city in the southern[LINE]
part of Fitzgald. Fierce battles are[LINE]
fought day and night in the arena.[END]

//Text $1A6B80
#WRITE(ptr,$18A270)
An underwater cave that connects[LINE]
Shiden and Moreau.[END]

//Text $1A6B80
#WRITE(ptr,$18A2A8)
An underwater cave that connects[LINE]
Shiden and Moreau.[END]

//Text $1A6B18
#WRITE(ptr,$18A2E0)
A snowy forest that connects[LINE]
eastern and western Phandaria.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6A80
#WRITE(ptr,$18A318)
山のいただきにある森。[LINE]
神殿へと向かう道のため、神殿関係者以外が[LINE]
利用する姿を目にする機会は少ない。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6A80
#WRITE(ptr,$18A318)
A forest at the top of a mountain.[LINE]
As the main path to Straylize Temple, it [LINE]
mainly is used by missionaries and priests.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A69F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A350)
地底深くにある地上軍の研究施設。[LINE]
ベルクラントの砲撃によって地中から[LINE]
姿を現した。[END]
English:
//Text $1A69F8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A350)
A research facility for the Er'ther forces[LINE]
deep beneath the earth. It was unearth[LINE]
by Belcrant's bombardment.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6988
#WRITE(ptr,$18A388)
旅する者が休息に立ち寄る小屋。[LINE]
ここでは不思議な出会いがあるかも。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6988
#WRITE(ptr,$18A388)
A hut where travelers stop to rest.[LINE]
You may have a strange encounter here.[END]

//Text $1A6928
#WRITE(ptr,$18A3C0)
A haven for those who have mastered[LINE]
the art of making food sacks.[LINE]
[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A68D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A3F8)
生態金属ベルセリウムによって造られた[LINE]
輸送施設。[END]
English:
//Text $1A68D8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A3F8)
A transport vehicle made of the biometal[LINE]
Berselium.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A6870
#WRITE(ptr,$18A430)
ジェノスの街とトーンの山小屋を結ぶ[LINE]
雪の降り積もった山道。[END]
English:
//Text $1A6870
#WRITE(ptr,$18A430)
A snow-covered mountain road that[LINE]
connects Janos with Torn's Cabin.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
A ship once known for its heroics.[LINE]
The ship has resurfaced once again to carry[LINE]
out the blitzkrieg strategy used in the Aeth'er War.[END]

//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
A ship once known for its heroics.[LINE]
The ship has resurfaced once again to carry[LINE]
out the blitzkrieg strategy used in the Aeth'er War.[END]

//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
かつて勇名を馳せた船。[LINE]
天地戦争で用いた電撃作戦を再び敢行して[LINE]
外殻に浮上した。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7878
#WRITE(ptr,$18A468)
A ship once known for its heroics.[LINE]
The ship has resurfaced once again to carry[LINE]
out the blitzkrieg strategy used in the Aeth'er War.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7808
#WRITE(ptr,$18A4A0)
ラディスロウから一番近い空中都市。[LINE]
空中都市同士を結ぶ、転送装置の[LINE]
ターミナルがある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7808
#WRITE(ptr,$18A4A0)
The nearest aerial city from Radisrol.[LINE]
There is a transporter terminal that[LINE]
connects the cities.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A4D8)
イグナシーと転送装置で結ばれている[LINE]
空中都市のひとつ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A4D8)
One of the aerial cities connected[LINE]
to Ignasea via a transporter.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7768
#WRITE(ptr,$18A510)
空中都市群を空路で結んでいた[LINE]
浮遊クルーザーがある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7768
#WRITE(ptr,$18A510)
An Aeth'er Cruiser used to link the[LINE]
aerial cities.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A548)
イグナシーと転送装置で結ばれている[LINE]
空中都市のひとつ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A548)
One of the aerial cities connected[LINE]
to Ignasea via a transporter.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A76E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A580)
空中都市群の中でも重要な拠点のひとつ。[LINE]
天上軍の技術研究施設がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A76E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A580)
One of the most important bases of the[LINE]
aerial cities. It is home to the technological[LINE]
research facilities for the Aeth'erian army. [END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A5B8)
イグナシーと転送装置で結ばれている[LINE]
空中都市のひとつ。[END]
English:
//Text $1A77B8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A5B8)
One of the aerial cities connected[LINE]
to Ignasea via a transporter.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7668
#WRITE(ptr,$18A5F0)
空中都市群の中でも重要な拠点のひとつ。[LINE]
守護竜のコントロール施設がある。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7668
#WRITE(ptr,$18A5F0)
One of the most important bases of[LINE]
the aerial cities. There is a control[LINE]
facility for the guardian dragons.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A75E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A628)
空中都市群の最重要拠点。[LINE]
ダイクロフトにある神の眼によって[LINE]
全ての空中都市の機能が制御されている。[END]
English:
//Text $1A75E8
#WRITE(ptr,$18A628)
The most important base of the aerial[LINE]
cities. The functions of all the other cities[LINE]
are controlled by the Eye of Atamoni here.[END]

//Text $1A7598
#WRITE(ptr,$18A660)
A village formed by Katz who have[LINE]
come to the Outer Shell.[END]

Japanese:
//Text $1A7508
#WRITE(ptr,$18A698)
ラディスロウのあった場所を[LINE]
レンズ砲で打ち抜いてできた穴。[LINE]
地上と外殻大地を繋ぐ唯一にして希望の道。[END]
English:
//Text $1A7508
#WRITE(ptr,$18A698)
A hole made by the lens cannon where Radisrol[LINE]
was once located. It is the only path connecting[LINE]
the Er'ther Lands and the Outer Shell.[END]
